name: Dragon Ball Clicker
description:
If you like Dragon Ball, then you will enjoy this little game. The nature of this game is a regular clicker. The point of the game is to generate ki, and transform that ki into more fighting power. You can use ki to train under different schedules. 

I do not own the characters, and the character designs and name belong to their respective company. The code and game design belong to me. 

Hope you like the game, and have a great time. The game is rather complete and do not expect to give any further updates, but I will probably release a phone version.
